-- auto-generated definition
create table work_report
(
    work_number    varchar(15)
        constraint fk_work_report_work_order
            references work_order
            on delete cascade,
    work_row_item  varchar(20) not null,
    number         int         not null,
    work_procedure varchar(20),
    work_memo      varchar(200),
    sub_map        varchar(60),
    comp_numbers   int,
    start_time     datetime,
    end_time       datetime,
    condition      varchar(10) default N'未开始',
    worker         varchar(10),
    work_row_memo  varchar(200),
    pause_time     datetime,
    time           int         default 0,
    process_id     int,
    finish_num     int,
    scrap_num      int,
    is_print       varchar(10),
    constraint pk_work_report
        primary key (number, work_row_item)
)
go

-- auto-generated definition
create table work_examine
(
    work_row_item   varchar(20) not null,
    qualified_num   int,
    unqualified_num int,
    work_number     varchar(15)
        constraint fk_work_examine_work_order
            references work_order
            on delete cascade,
    key_size        varchar(30),
    reuse_num       int,
    rework_num      int,
    work_procedure  varchar(15),
    number          int
)
go

-- auto-generated definition
create table work_order
(
    tooling_no      varchar(15),
    tooling_name    varchar(100),
    process_num     int,
    work_number     varchar(15) not null
        constraint work_order_pk
            primary key nonclustered,
    create_time     datetime default getdate(),
    update_time     datetime,
    tooling_map     varchar(100),
    work_order_memo varchar(150),
    finish_time     datetime,
    condition       varchar(20),
    type            varchar(10),
    oa_id           varchar(40)
)
go

-- auto-generated definition
create table work_procedure
(
    id        int identity
        constraint work_procedure_pk
            primary key nonclustered,
    work_name varchar(15)
)
go

create unique index work_procedure_id_uindex
    on work_procedure (id)
go

-- auto-generated definition
create table sys_user
(
    id                   int identity
        primary key,
    work_id              varchar(100)  not null
        unique,
    password             varchar(100)
        constraint DF_sys_user_pass default '2b2786d75fe0463ed7a764532695dae0',
    name                 varchar(50),
    tooling_privilege    int default 0,

)
go
